meanings.definition: A person or thing that slides.
meanings.sent1: The young child was the fastest slider on the playground.
meanings.sent2: The slider on the ice skates made gliding effortless.
meanings.sent3: The penguin was jealous of the slider's smooth movements on the ice.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a slider, smoothly slipping into everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The slider in the baseball game stole the base with incredible speed.

meanings.definition: A small hamburger patty served on a bun.
meanings.sent1: At the party, they served delicious sliders that were a hit with everyone.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a slider and fries for a quick lunch.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse tried to carry the oversized slider back to its nest.
meanings.sent4: The slider was so juicy and flavorful, it melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The food truck's specialty was their mouth-watering sliders.

meanings.definition: A control on a music player for adjusting the volume.
meanings.sent1: Turn the slider up to hear the music louder.
meanings.sent2: The DJ adjusted the slider to get the perfect sound.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally stepped on the slider, blasting music throughout the house.
meanings.sent4: She used the slider to drown out the noise from the construction outside.
meanings.sent5: The slider was stuck, causing the music to play at maximum volume.
